name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
schedule:
WEEK	SESSION THEME
1	Introduction
2	Break
3	ST/Short CI/Gist extraction
4	ST/Short CI/Gist extraction
5	ST/Short CI/Gist extraction
6	CI note-taking/shadowing
7	Break
8	CI-note taking/shadowing
9	Mid-term
10	Short CI (EI format): Celebrity press conference (Group activity)
11	Short CI (EI format): Museum (Group activity)
12	Short CI (EI format): Business (Group activity)
13	Short CI (EI format): New product launch press conference (Group activity)
14	Short CI (EI format): Foreign visitors (Group activity)
15	Short CI (EI format): Factory (Group activity)
16	Mock EI
17	Mock EI
18	Final
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
-	25% on mid-term examination
-	25% on final examination
-	50% on continual assessments: group activity; mock EI; in-class performance; attendance to lectures; 	homework
